entry.title: Omcan - 14" Manual Meat Slicer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Omcan
Type: Meat Slicer
Price: 1811.00 - 6450.00 (6 variants)

Omcan has six different models of manual meat slicers with a 14" blade: you can choose a light duty, medium duty, or heavy duty model. Each model can do some cheese slicing, but the amount of cheese slicing will vary depending on the model.

Each of these commercial meat slicers is covered with a one year parts and labour warranty. To know the difference between the various models, see the bullet points below, or check out the spec sheets for a full list of features on the model you're interested in.

  • LIGHT DUTY
  • MEDIUM DUTY
  • HEAVY DUTY

MS-CN-0350
Economy Model, Cheese slicing

  • Belt driven
  • 1 hour of slicing per day
  • Can handle a moderate amount of cheese slicing
  • 0.5 HP
  • 110v
  • Dimensions 31" x 24" x 19.5" (WDH)
  • Cutting thickness 0.2 - 15 mm
  • Made in China
  • Item number 23544
  • DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

MS-IT-0350-L
Elite Series, Cheese slicing,
QPS approved

  • Belt driven
  • 2 hours of slicing
  • Can handle a moderate amount of cheese slicing
  • 0.5 HP
  • 110v
  • Dimensions 22.8" x 23" x 19" (WDH)
  • Made in Italy
  • Cutting thickness 0 -16 mm
  • Item number 13637
  • DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

MS-IT-0350
Cheese slicing, Horizontal,
Perfect for thin prosciutto

  • Belt driven
  • 1 hours of slicing
  • Ideal for heavy sausages, roasts, cheese, and other compact meat.
  • 0.5 HP
  • 110v
  • Dimensions 25.6" x 32.3" x 25.1" (WDH)
  • Made in Italy
  • Item number 39583
  • DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

MS-IT-0370-V
Cheese slicing, Horizontal,
Perfect for thin prosciutto, QPS approved, 14.5" blade

  • Belt driven
  • 2 hours of slicing
  • Cheese slicing is not recommended
  • 0.5 HP
  • 110v
  • Dimensions 32" x 28" x 25" (WDH)
  • Precise decimal thickness regulator ranges (0 - 16mm)
  • Made in Italy
  • Item number 13650
  • DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

MS-IT-0350-G
Cheese slicing, Gear driven,
NSF approved

  • Gear driven
  • 8 hours or more of slicing
  • Can handle a large amount of cheese slicing
  • 0.35 HP
  • 110v
  • Dimensions 30" x 24.8" x 20" (WDH)
  • Cutting thickness 0 - 14mm
  • Made in Italy
  • Item number 13643
  • DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

MS-IT-0350-H
Cheese slicing, Gear driven,
Horizontal, Fresh Meat, Quebec standards

  • Gear driven
  • 8 hours or more of slicing
  • Can handle a large amount of cheese slicing
  • 0.4 HP
  • 110v
  • Dimensions 31.5" x 29.5" x 22" (WDH)
  • Cutting thickness 0 - 25mm
  • Specifically designed to cut fresh meat
  • In compliance with province of Quebec safety standards
  • Made in Italy
  • Item number 39631
  • DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

WARRANTY

One year parts and labour warranty.

s:variant.title: Medium duty (horizontal - QPS approved - 14.5" blade) - MS-IT-0370-V
Heavy duty (gear driven - horizontal - fresh meat - Quebec standards) - MS-IT-0350-H

entry.title: Omcan - 13" Manual Meat Slicer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Omcan
Type: Meat Slicer
Price: 1952.00 - 5678.00 (5 variants)

Omcan has six manual meat slicers with a 13" blade: you can choose either a medium duty or heavy duty model. Each model has a few slight variations. All are capable of slicing cheese: some can slice for a short time, and others can slice for many hours a day. 

Each of these slicers comes with a blade sharpener and each one is covered by a one year parts and labour warranty. For more information on the specific model you're interested in, check out the table below or check out the spec sheets. 

  • MEDIUM DUTY
  • HEAVY DUTY

MS-IT-0330-L
Cheese slicing, QPS approved

  • Belt driven
  • 2 hours of slicing
  • Average cheese slicing
  • 0.5 HP
  • 110v
  • Dimensions 30.3" x 21.6" x 18.3" (WDH)
  • Cutting thickness 0 - 16mm
  • Made in Venezeula
  • Item number 13635
  • DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

MS-IT-0330-CE
Horizontal, Thin prosciutto slicing

  • Belt driven
  • 1 hour of slicing
  • Ideal for heavy sausages, roasts, cheese, and other compact meat.
  • 0.5 HP
  • 110v
  • Dimensions 21.6" x 28" x 21.6" (WDH)
  • Made in Italy
  • Has a horizontal carriage (instead of gravity fed)
  • Item number 46163
  • DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

MS-IT-0330-G
Cheese slicing, Gear driven,
NSF approved

  • Gear driven
  • 8 hours or more of slicing
  • A large amount of cheese slicing and hard meats
  • 0.35 HP
  • 110v
  • Dimensions 28.75" x 24" x 20" (WDH)
  • Cutting thickness 0 - 14mm
  • The brand is "Omas"
  • Made in Italy
  • Item number 13642
  • FREE SHIPPING
  • DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

MS-IT-0330-F
Cheese slicing, Gear driven

  • Gear driven
  • 8 hours or more of slicing
  • A high amount of cheese slicing
  • 0.47 HP
  • 120v
  • Dimensions 26.3" x 29.7" x 20.8" (WDH)
  • Cutting thickness 0 - 14mm
  • "A big size gravity feed slicer of elegant design"
  • Made in Italy

  • FREE SHIPPING
  • DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

MS-IT-0330-C
 Cheese Slicing, Gear driven,
ETL & NSF

  • Gear driven
  • 8 hours or more
  • Ideal for deli or sandwich shops and restaurants, and a lot of cheese slicing
  • 0.47 HP
  • 120v
  • Dimensions 26.3" x 28.7" x 20.8" (WDH)
  • Made in Italy

entry.title: Omcan - 12" Manual Meat Slicer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Omcan
Type: Meat Slicer
Price: 846.00 - 5227.00 (10 variants)

Omcan has a number of manual meat slicers with a 12" blade: they have light, medium, and heavy duty models available. Some are gear driven, some are belt driven. Some are part of their Economy meat slicers (which were made in China); others are their "Elite" series (which were made in Italy).

There is also the difference between their gravity-feed slicers and their horizontal slicers. Some of these models are capable of slicing a small amount of cheese, and other can slice cheese for hours. Check out the information below and the spec sheets for more information.

  • MEDIUM DUTY

entry.title: Globe C12 - 12" Manual Meat Slicer - 1/3 HP
entry.summary:
Vendor: Globe
Type: Meat Slicer
Price: 1588.00

The Globe C12 is a perfect compact meat slicer for a business who is either on a budget, or who doesn’t need to slice that much meat a day. Despite being an “economy” choice, Globe is a high-end brand — so you know you’re going to get a great product. This particular model will be best suited for a business who is slicing meat for about 1 hour a day.

As one of the best manufacturers in the foodservice industry, Globe has packed this slicer with a number of great features. It has a knife sharpener, which is easy to access and has “dual action” with two stones, so you can get an extremely sharp knife. Another great feature is that the food chute, slice deflector, and the knife cover are all removable which makes them easy to clean.

We here at iFoodEquipment think Globe make’s some pretty darn good meat slicers — so if you’re on a budget, or are slicing a minimal amount of meat a day, we think this slicer could be perfect for your business.

Check out the Globe meat slicer buying guide, which gives you a side by side comparison of all of Globe's meat slicers.

      • 12" hard chromed special alloy hollow ground knife, longer lasting and easier to sharpen
      • 0 to 9/16" slice thickness
      • 1/3 HP fan-cooled knife motor with permanently lubricated ball bearings, overload protection and manual reset
      • Oversized positive traction grooved belt drive
      • Smooth stainless steel ball bearing chute slide for ease of operation
      • Stain resistant and easy-to-clean anodized aluminum finish
      • Ergonomic dual purpose handle
      • Lightweight and compact Italian space-saving design

    VIDEO

    SPECS

    Motor 1/3 HP
    Volts 115-60-1
    Amps 3
    Drive Type Belt
    Cheese Slicing Yes (but very little)
    Slicing Volume 1 hour
    Max Slice 9/16”
    Product Cutting Capacity (W x Diameter x H) 9.75 “ x 8” x 8.6”
    Overall Dimensions (WDH) 24” x 23.5” x 17.5”

    WARRANTY

    One year parts and labor warranty.

    DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.title: Globe GC512 - 12" Manual Meat Slicer - 1/3 HP
entry.summary:
Vendor: Globe
Type: Meat Slicer
Price: 4497.00

The Globe “GC512” is a gear driven medium duty meat slicer, which is perfect for an establishment who will need the meat slicer for a moderate amount of work throughout the day (about 4 hours of slicing per day). It can also handle a good amount of cheese slicing throughout the day (up to 90% of your 4 hours).

The GC512 has a number of great features. The body is made of a stain resistant anodized aluminum base which is really easy to keep clean and sanitary. And this slicer features smart design features like its moisture-proof, sanitation sealed On/Off switch.

Globe offers some of the best equipment in the foodservice business, yet they do so at a fraction of the cost of other high-end brands. So if you want to invest in your business, but are also looking for a reasonably price option, a Globe meat slicer could do the trick.

Check out the Globe meat slicer buying guide, which gives you a side by side comparison of all of Globe's meat slicers.

      • 12" diameter gear driven, high torque knife
      • 7/8" slice thickness
      • 1/3 HP totally enclosed knife motor, permanently lubricated sealed ball bearings
      • Easy to access top mounted, removable metal knife sharpener, with two stones and dual action for a razor sharp cutting edge!
      • Knife cover interlock and permanently attached knife ring guard - for added operator safety during use and cleaning
      • Stainless steel knife, food chute and slicer table
      • Stainless steel knife and motor covers, slice deflector, and product receiving tray
      • Easy-to-clean removable slice deflector and product tray
      • Includes 6 foot cord and plug
      • Power indicator light
      • Non-slip rubber feet

        SPECS

        Motor 1/3 HP
        Volts 115-60-1
        Amps 4.8
        Drive Type Gear
        Cheese Slicing Yes
        Slicing Volume 24 hours per day
        Max Slice 7/8””
        Product Cutting Capacity (W x Diameter x L) 10” x 7.5” x 8.75”
        Overall Dimensions (WDH) 19.4” x 27.3” x 21”

        WARRANTY

        One year parts and labor warranty.

        DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.title: Globe G12A - 12" Automatic Meat Slicer - 1/2 HP
entry.summary:
Vendor: Globe
Type: Meat Slicer
Price: 5749.00

The Globe “G12A” is automatic medium duty meat slicer, which is perfect for an establishment who will need the meat slicer for a moderate amount of work throughout the day (about 2.5 hours of slicing per day). It can also handle a bit of cheese slicing throughout the day (about 1 hour 15 minutes of your 2.5 hours).

The G12A has a number of great features. The knife ring guard is permanently attached, which makes this machine extremely safe, so you’re not going to have to worry about the safety of the operator. The blade has been made of a hard chromed, special allow hollow ground — which means it is long lasting and really easy to sharpen. Plus, the slicer comes with a high quality sharpener.

Globe offers some of the best equipment in the foodservice business, yet they do so at a fraction of the cost of other high-end brands. So if you want to invest in your business, but are also looking for a reasonably price option, a Globe meat slicer could do the trick.

Check out the Globe meat slicer buying guide, which gives you a side by side comparison of all of Globe's meat slicers.

      • Knife cover interlock - Provides superior operator safety during knife cleaning.
      • The easy-turn, top-mounted sharpener is a two-stone, dual-action, all metal design that allows you to quickly return a razor sharp edge to your knife whenever its needed
      • An ideal 35° angle food chute - makes slicing easier with less waste and allows the operator to view the slices produced
      • An improved ergonomic design - places the handle on the end weight of the slicer for better grip and usability. The design keeps hands farther from the knife and allows for improved user interface with the machine
      • No-volt release prevents activation - of the slicer when the power is interrupted during operation

        SPECS

        Motor 1/2 HP
        Volts 115-60-1
        Amps 3
        Drive Type Belt
        Cheese Slicing Yes
        Slicing Volume 2.5 hours per day
        Max Slice 1/2””
        Product Cutting Capacity (W x Diameter x L) 10” x 8.75” x 10.5”
        Max Dimensions (WDH) 25” x 25.25” x 20.25”

        WARRANTY

        One year parts and labor warranty.

        FREE SHIPPING

        *This item has free shipping in Canada! Now, some conditions may apply, so please see our shipping policies or contact us for more information.

        For instance, even though an item has free shipping, if it weighs over 75 pounds, you may be charged a tailgate fee (unless you have a forklift or a loading dock). Or if you live in a rural location, there may be additional charges. Otherwise, this item ships for free all across Canada!

        DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

The G10 has a number of great features. The knife ring guard is permanently attached, which makes this machine extremely safe, so you’re not going to have to worry about the safety of the operator. The blade has been made of a hard chromed, special allow hollow ground — which means it is long-lasting and really easy to sharpen. Plus, the slicer comes with a high-quality sharpener.

Globe offers some of the best equipment in the food service business, yet they do so at a fraction of the cost of other high-end brands. So if you want to invest in your business, but are also looking for a reasonably priced option, a Globe meat slicer could do the trick.

Check out the Globe meat slicer buying guide, which gives you a side by side comparison of all of Globe's meat slicers.

      • Knife cover interlock - Provides superior operator safety during knife cleaning.
      • The easy-turn, top-mounted sharpener is a two-stone, dual-action, all-metal design that allows you to quickly return a razor-sharp edge to your knife whenever it's needed
      • An ideal 35° angle food chute - makes slicing easier with less waste and allows the operator to view the slices produced
      • An improved ergonomic design - places the handle on the end weight of the slicer for better grip and usability. The design keeps hands farther from the knife and allows for an improved user interface with the machine
      • No-volt release prevents activation - of the slicer when the power is interrupted during operation

        VIDEO

        SPECS

        Motor 1/3 HP
        Volts 115-60-1
        Amps 3
        Drive Type Belt
        Cheese Slicing Yes
        Slicing Volume 1 hour per day
        Max Slice 9/16”
        Product Cutting Capacity (W x Diameter x L) 9.5” x 7.25” x 10.5”
        Max Dimensions (WDH) 17.5” x 21.25” x 14.5”

        WARRANTY

        One year parts and labor warranty.

entry.title: Omcan MS-IT-0370-H - 15" Manual Meat Slicer - 2/5 HP
entry.summary:
Vendor: Omcan
Type: Meat Slicer
Price: 7389.00

Omas S-Series Slicers are especially designed to cut fresh meat. The large horizontal carriage has a double sliding table, specifically designed to cut fresh meat by providing a long stroke depth.

The high performance gear driven motor offers a constant blade speed throughout the cut, for precision slicing. The carriage rolls easily on ball bearings and the anodized aluminium body movable. The machine is made of anodized aluminium alloy, which is resistant to food-acids.

The smooth finish is durable and easy to clean. The flow line design and the rounded corners of the polished anodized aluminium body makes the after use cleaning easy. The high carbon steel, hard chromed blade has a hollow ground taper that permits sharpening for full life of the blade and to facilitate the penetration and the slice detachment.

      • Blade size: 15"/370mm
      • Removable carriage, end grip and blade cover for easy cleaning
      • Anodized aluminium alloy construction
      • Superglide: Specially treated gauge-plate and blade cover for a smoother performance that ensures precision cuts at all times
      • In Compliance With Province Of Quebec Safety Standards
      • Additional safety features: Fixed blade ring guard; aluminium thumb guard; block on gauge-plate when carriage is removed; NVR (No Voltage Release) switch and protections on the sharpener and blade

SPECS

Item Number: 38915
Blade Size: 15”/370 Mm
Power: 0.40 Hp / 0.30 Kw
Cheese Slicing: 8 Hours Or More
RPM: 250
Cutting Size: 14.56” X 10.23”/ 270 X 260 Mm
Cut Thickness: 0”-1” / 0-25 Mm
Voltage: 110v/60/1
Weight: 57 Kg./ 125 lb
Packaging Weight: 63.5 Kg./140 lb

Packaging Dimensions: 36” X 34” X 27”

entry.summary:
Vendor: Axis
Type: Meat Slicer
Price: 1337.00

This Axis AX-S12U "Ultra" meat slicer is perfect for medium-usage operations. It has sanitary anodized components, making it simple to clean: all you're going to need is a wet cloth and a mild detergent. It is belt driven, with a V-belt, and it has a 0.5 HP fan cooled motor.

      • One piece base with no crevices to avoid any build-up of bacteria for easy cleaning
      • Easy to maintain – economical service and repair with a long-life belt
      • Slicer’s knife runs at 300 rpm for optimal performance, to avoid product heating and stressing
      • Steel motor pulley
      • Thermo-protection to avoid motor burning
      • Microswitch protection on cover blade; blade will stop when microswitch loses its contact to avoid any injury
      • Permanently lubricated ball bearings to ensure quiet operation
      • Wide stainless steel product holder providing sanitary requirements as it comes into contact with any food
      • Plexi safety guard on carriage tray to prevent accidents
      • Precision system provides thousands slice adjustment and consistent cuts of foods from tissue thin to 9/16’’ (14mm)
      • Built-in top mounted sharpener

entry.title: Sirman MIRRA300P - 12" Manual Meat Slicer - 1/6 HP
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sirman
Type: Meat Slicer
Price: 1418.00

An elegant design for total dependability ! The slide shaftt is made of ground, chromed steel for a smoother operation. The high quality bushings and ball bearings are self-lubricating.

The dial thickness control cam system allows for an always precise cut. A safety cover is placed under the motor and the electrical components. The hopper features an exclusive heavy duty plastic protection to keep operator`s hand at safe distance from the blade while operating the slicer.

Easy to clean aluminum alloy construction does not crack or stain. The carriage and the centre plate are quickly removable without tools.

      • Operation: Gravity Feed. 
      • Knife: One piece, chromium plated 100cr6 forged carbon steel blade. 
      • Sharpener: Built-in, removable, two store dual action. 
      • Slice thickness: Infinitely variable up to 0.5". 
      • Switch: on/off button. 
      • Button is lit when machine is on.
      • 12" Blade Size, Belt Driven.
      • Conforms to the Quebec NORMS.
